identification.question: It is a concrete model of how a system will appear or behave, and usually depict the user interface.
It is a non-functional user interface layout that uses actual GUI components and  validates UI design.
Its main goal is to build a very robust prototype in a structured manner and constantly refine it
It is the process of applying various techniques and principles for the purpose of defining a device, process or system in sufficient detail to permit its physical realization.
It refers to the iterative process through which requirements are translated into a “blueprint” for building software.
It establishes a basic structural framework that identifies the major components of a system and the communication among these components.
It leads to the accurate specification of requirements, and the construction of a valid and useable system from the users’ perspective via conventional software development models
It consists of a central data store and a set of independent components that access the data store.
This Architectural Style’s system is organized as a set of services and associated servers and clients that access and use these services.
It exploits diverse connectivity between participants in a network and the cumulative bandwidth of the network participants.
